div.p: Procedure follow up codes: a selection of SNOMED CT codes relevant to procedure follow up.

ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct

Display

30549001 Removal of suture (procedure)
241031001 Removal of drain (procedure)
35963001 Removal of staples (procedure)
225164002 Removal of ligature

229506003 Scar tissue massage (regime/therapy)
274441001 Suction drainage (procedure)
394725008 Diabetes medication review (procedure)
